post:
Hi Folks,

Following the success of the last LES Exclusive offer for the new optimised storage KVM services I thought I would put out a general offer with a bit of a perk, pick between 3x bandwidth or an extra 10% storage!

All plans below are in Phoenix Arizona USA.

## YABS from a KVM1000 plan.

## KVM250

* 1 CPU Core (fair share none dedicated)
* 512 MB Ram
* 250 GB Disk space
* 500 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared - unmetered inbound)
* 1 IPv4 address

€7 /6 months
€13 /12 months
ORDER LINK: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=206

<hr>

## KVM500

* 1 CPU Core (1/2 core dedicated)
* 1 GB Ram
* 500 GB Disk space
* 1 TB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared - unmetered inbound)
* 1 IPv4 address

€6.25 /3 months
€12.50 /6 months
€25.00 /12 months
ORDER LINK: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=205

<hr>

## KVM1000

* 1 CPU Core (1/2 Core dedicated)
* 2 GB Ram
* 1000 GB Disk space
* 2 TB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared - unmetered inbound)
* 1 IPv4 address

€5.25 /month
€15.75 /3 months
€31.50 /6 months
€63 /12 months
ORDER LINK: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=194

<hr>

**When ordering please be sure to make it clear which extra you want in the order notes section during checkout, Triple BW or 10% Extra disk, this will be reflected on your VPS within 24 hours of ordering.**

## terms tl;dr and service-specific info

* No tor
* No crypto mining
* No open proxies
* Please disconnect form your VPN or proxy when orders to avoid automatic rejection
* No click bots/hitleap etc
* These servers are intended for storage, the CPU's will be a few generations old E5's, while you are welcome to run general services please keep in mind everything about this service is designed for storage and support will be limited to that.
